review: I consulted the doctor regarding the pain due to wisdom tooth. He politely explained in detail about the options of both temporary and permanent solution. He also informed about the other dental issues that he identified and left the choice to me to decide and take necessary action as desired. He listened to my concerns and addressed them one by one. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The visit to doctor Aman was vey good. The issue and treatment were explained in detail and the procedure itself was painless. I was dreading to go to a dentist for more than a year due to fear of pain but that was resolved here.The charges are economical too. Zero wait time. Highly recommended
reply_text:
Thank u so much for ur trust and kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have got my tooth removed beforehand also and was very scared because of the bad experience. But i must say I coudn't have been treated better this time. It just took Dr. Sapra 10 min for the whole process of extraction and it was over without any pain and discomfort. Doctor's friendly nature relaxed me a lot. Will recommend to everyone.

**** ** ***** **** *** ** **** **** * ********i have visited for dental checkup and after checkup doctor was explaining the further treatment and meanwhile he started talking with his staff and I was checking mails in my mobile then he bursted on me.. According to the doctor I disrespected him but but first he started wasting my time..when you are attending patient try to attend the patient first **** ** ******** *** **** ** **.if any patient visiting for treatment that doesn't mean they  have a lot of time *** *** *** *** **** ******* ****** ** **** ******.I haven't seen this type ** *** ** *** doctor in my life. ***** ************* * ******** ******** *** ** ****** **** *** ** ***** ********** ***** **** ***** ** *** ** ***********
Lastly I don't recommend this doctor to anyone *** **** **** ************** ******* ** **** ********* ** **** *** *** **** **** ******* ** ******
Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited the doctor for tooth extraction. 3rd Molar. The doctor took just 5-6 minutes for the extraction. I didn’t felt any pain during the procedure or even after that. Bleeding stopped within an hour and I was normal after 1 day. Very much satisfied. The doctor is confident, experienced and gentle. Very much recommended

review:
Dr Sapra brings a personal touch to every patient who walks into Dental Blessings. His approach is patient first and cares more for their comfort and peace of mind before anything.

Centrally located with excellent specialists available, this is not only a great family dentistry clinic but also for specialised treatments. 

As a patient for over 18 years, this is a clinic visit one looks forward to.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: A very genuine and helpful doctor (Dr. Aman). He treats what needs to be treated and doesnt push the patient unnecessarily. A clean clinic with all SOP’s followed. I am pretty apprehensive of dental work but he made it all easy and work was doen accurately. Dental work is more of an art work on teeth, he has that hand that does that intricate work.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your trust , will always do my best
